commit.message:
expr.c (store_field): If BITSIZE is negative, use size of type.

	* expr.c (store_field): If BITSIZE is negative, use size of type.
	(expand_expr, case COMPONENT_EXPR): Likewise.

From-SVN: r36588

files.patch:

+
+	* expr.c (store_field): If BITSIZE is negative, use size of type.
+	(expand_expr, case COMPONENT_EXPR): Likewise.
